title: WHAT DO YOU MEAN RIOT!?!?!?!??!
body:
So i download league open it and it says "Update Failed Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information" 
Then it gives me the option to retry the update but when i click retry the same message pops up again. Can someone please help this makes me sad :(

replies.body: Hey everyone, I opened up the client today and the patching is going fine. I guess this was just a temporary Riot goof. Thanks for the responses.
It sounds like you might still be on the legacy client.  Is there a specific % you're getting this error?  Let me know and I can help get this fixed up!

there is no one on because of this .   I dont think this is a settings issue sir... There isnt even a notice from Riot saying they know of a p[roblem.   Its an endless loop of restarting and failed patches.
The error comes up as soon as i open the client and yes its the legacy client. The progress bar dosent advance at all.

Thanks for the follow up info!  Getting an error this early might be indicating a security setting with your OS, antivirus, or something else that's blocking your game files from being read.  Meaning the patcher can't locate your game files and prepare them to update.

Your best bet here is to go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure League is added as an exception and cleared of any blocks.  I hope that helps!
I'm having the same issue, my security settings are fine with everything. Just stuck in an endless loop of failed patching.
